description.value: Scenario 1.6, test 2/2 for eOverdracht sending systems. This test focuses on the handoff phase ('overdrachtfase'). In a normal scenario, the test for the negotiation phase ('aanmeldfase') has been completed before running this test, although it may be performed in isolation.

nts:include.description: At the sending XIS, a new Task is created in status 'in-progress'.

nts:include.name: Notify new Task
nts:include.description: The sending XIS should send a notification to the receiving XIS because a new Task has been created with status 'requested'.

description.value: The sending XIS should serve the Task specified in the notification.
After reading the Task, the receiving XIS performs a read operation on the nursing handoff Composition that is referenced on Task.input.
The sending XIS should handle an update of the Task with the status 'completed' which the receiving uses to signal that has received the nursing handoff.
